Broughton, Modeen and Cheryl Goggins -- Coordinator and Assistant Coordinator of the Congressional Black Caucus Dinner
Broughton, Modeen and Cheryl Goggins -- Coordinator and Assistant Coordinator of the Congressional Black Caucus Dinner

Dr. Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., Modeen Broughton, and Cheryl Goggins discuss the significance of the Black Caucus Dinner, an important political affair of the year for Black officials, and how the funds raised by the event are utilized.
Broughton, Modeen and Cheryl Goggins -- Coordinator and Assistant Coordinator of the Congressional Black Caucus Dinner.: 1974 September 24
